vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Δαλματία (L, Δελ-), -ας, ἡ
Dalmatia, a part of Illyria on E. coast of the Adriatic: 2Ti.4:10.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撻馬太 这个專有名詞,地名在原文的意思是 "祭司袍"
亞得里亞海(Adriatic Sea)的伊利里亞區(Illyricum) (提後 4:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
挞马太 这个专有名词,地名在原文的意思是 "祭司袍"
亚得里亚海(Adriatic Sea)的伊利里亚区(Illyricum) (提后 4:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Đalmatia; Đa-ma-ti, một miền núi ở phía Đông bờ biển A-đờ-ria-tích
